title: 0.5.0所有新加入内容和修复的bug(转自mcpe吧）
author: Diego1996
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Diego1996 于 2012-11-3 11:23 编辑 

声明一下这个帖是转载的，原贴: http://tieba.baidu.com/p/1958769294

Mushroom farming 蘑菇现在可以种植了(就是在暗室扩散)

Melons 加入西瓜

Torch bug fix 火把bug修复(就是火把可以放在栅栏旁边而不掉落)

Paintings 加入画

Glowstone 加入萤石

An "alternate nether" 加入“下界替代物”(一个黑乎乎的世界，有猪人)

The Nether reactor 加入下界反应堆(启动下界的东东，需要3钻石6铁，启动他需要13原石36金)

Zombie Pigmen 加入僵尸猪人(站起来的猪，身上挂着藤蔓，拿金剑，打死掉落金子，攻击性生物)

Many Bug Fixes 更多的bug修复
Bug

[MCPE-1] - Trapdoors can't be crafted in survival生存模式没有活版门
[MCPE-2] - No description at Smooth stone in crafting bench(这是啥？看不懂)
[MCPE-4] - You can't leave your bed when sleeping.你不能在睡觉时起床
[MCPE-6] - No explosion sound when creeper explodes爬行者(走路？爆炸？)时没有声音
[MCPE-7] - Seeds drop below grass block when using hoe种子会掉到耕地下面
[MCPE-11] - Survival bugs: Crop tiles survives farmland destroyed underneath them(lz看不懂)
[MCPE-14] - When destroying the top half of a bed in creative mode, it give a bed back as a resource.
创造模式里打破床会掉落
[MCPE-17] - TNT, Flint and Steel and Stone Bricks aren't available in the creative mode inventory.
创造模式没有tnt(明明有)，打火石，(？)和石砖
[MCPE-20] - Food not restoring the right number of hearts食物不能加正确的血量
[MCPE-23] - Door Duplication刷门bug
[MCPE-29] - Trapdoors can be placed on transparent blocks like flowers, saplings, glass etc.
活版门能够放在花，玻璃等方块上
[MCPE-30] - Placing door on a farmland will create a floating half-door.半门bug
[MCPE-46] - Torch can be placed on side of fence 火把可以放在栏杆侧面
[MCPE-51] - Bed: Respawn at the wrong height? 床的错误高度(？)
[MCPE-57] - Multiplayer infinity bone meal多人没有骨头
[MCPE-93] - Players sleeping in a bed can be pushed off the bed睡在床上可以被推下来
[MCPE-105] - You Can't Exit Your Bed With Split Touch Controls你不能通过触摸来离开起床
[MCPE-115] - Breaking block with torch on it莫名其妙的bug，摧毁带火把的方块
[MCPE-134] - Can't sleep with my bed like this(picture included)我没看见图在哪里，so不能翻译
[MCPE-160] - lava burns character when lava is several blocks away岩浆只会燃烧一定区域内的方块
[MCPE-172] - Stone bricks: Missing description 石砖:(这是啥)
[MCPE-189] - Missing Fence Sound Effect 没有栏杆(走动？放置？)的声音
[MCPE-190] - Farmland and other plants bug耕地以及作物bug
[MCPE-207] - TNT Block not available in creative不能在创造里点燃tnt
[MCPE-216] - Steel and flint don't take damage打火石和(？)不会扣耐久
[MCPE-218] - Bed: Should sleep when pressing the bottom end (？)
[MCPE-237] - Extra Feathers For Player 2 玩家2有羽毛？
[MCPE-261] - Player can fly out of the world玩家可以飞出这个世界
[MCPE-269] - Using an item can sometimes attack animal/player when not facing them
用方块打动物有时不扣血
[MCPE-272] - Animals sometimes never respawn in a map在一些地图里永远不会生成动物
[MCPE-303] - Sleeping at the edge of the map causes you to spawn really high in the sky after you die(？) [MCPE-345] - Torches Jumping off Fences(？)
[MCPE-370] - Trapdoor placement bug 活版门bug
[MCPE-382] - Player 1 places torches on ground, but player 2 sees them on the wall
玩家1看到火把在地上，玩家2看到火把在墙上
[MCPE-387] - Stuck when walking down side of fence when reaching closed gate(？)
[MCPE-408] - Sugarcane is unable to be placed on sand不能在沙子上放甘蔗
[MCPE-420] - Go to bed > wait until screen goes purply > quit > start world > stuck in bed 
上床，等界面变紫，退出，进入世界，就卡在床里面了
[MCPE-422] - Crash when loading saved world加载世界时崩溃

replies.txt_content: 14楼，说iphone什么冰城什么大型什么3d，这种类型的游戏能和MC比么？？！！你那种游戏拿个引擎改个贴图换几种界面和技能的动作，要复制多少都行！怎么能和伟大的MC相比？！

replies.author: letmeregister
replies.txt_content: 在基础上就没得比，都不是一个档次的。你那所谓的大型3d游戏就是一个玩人的游戏，让玩家沿着程序的设定去执行运算得到一个早就已经设定好的结果：等级，极品装备，宠物……看上去很丰富。是么？真的么？？？！！…这只是程序员早就写好的结果，你只是用你的手和脑子又重复帮电脑计算了一次而已！这种类型的是游戏在玩你！这怎么能和MC相比！MC不是小游戏！它的大小在于你的心又多大你的想象力又多宽广！以上
